title: VCMI hero class format
description: Format used to define classes of heroes in VCMI

faction.description: Faction this hero class belongs to

affinity.description: Affinity of hero class, might or magic

commander.description: Identifier of creature that is used as commander by heroes

secondarySkills.description: Chance to get specific secondary skill on level-up. All missing skills are considered to be banned

lowLevelChance.description: Chance to get specific primary skill on level-up, applicable for levels less than 10

highLevelChance.description: Chance to get specific primary skill on level-up, applicable for levels starting from 10

defaultTavern.description: Default chance for hero to appear in tavern, used only when value vas not set in tavern field

tavern.description: Chance for this hero to appear in tavern of this factions. Reversed version of field "tavern" from town format

index.description: Private field to break things, do not use.
